shortdesc.ph: Reports the events of preloading music assets.

p.codeblock: void onPreLoadEvent( String requestId, long songCode, int percent, String lyricUrl, int state, int reason);
virtual void onPreLoadEvent(const char* requestId, int64_t songCode, int percent, const char* lyricUrl, PreloadState state, MusicContentCenterStateReason reason) = 0;
onPreLoadEvent?( requestId: string, songCode: number, percent: number, lyricUrl: string, status: PreloadState, reason: MusicContentCenterStateReason ): void;
public abstract void OnPreLoadEvent(string requestId, long songCode, int percent, string lyricUrl, PreloadState state, MusicContentCenterStateReason reason);
onPreLoadEvent?( requestId: string, songCode: number, percent: number, lyricUrl: string, status: PreloadState, reason: MusicContentCenterStateReason ): void;
final void Function( String requestId, int songCode, int percent, String lyricUrl, PreloadState state, MusicContentCenterStateReason reason)? onPreLoadEvent;

section.p: When you call the method to preload music assets, the SDK will trigger this callback.

plentry.props: android ios cpp flutter unity rn

plentry.pd: The code of the music, which is an unique identifier of the music.
The current loading progress of the music asset. The value range is [0, 100].

pd.p: The loading status of the current music asset. See .

The loading statuses of the current music asset contain the following:
0: The preload of music assets is complete.
1: The preload of music assets fails.
2: The music assets are preloading.
